speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: SCENE V. Another part of the plains.

speaker: THERSITES
text_entry: Enter DIOMEDES and a Servant

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: Go, go, my servant, take thou Troilus' horse;

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: Present the fair steed to my lady Cressid:

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: Fellow, commend my service to her beauty;

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: Tell her I have chastised the amorous Trojan,

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: And am her knight by proof.

speaker: Servant
text_entry: I go, my lord.

speaker: Servant
text_entry: Exit

speaker: Servant
text_entry: Enter AGAMEMNON

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Renew, renew! The fierce Polydamas

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Hath beat down Menon: bastard Margarelon

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Hath Doreus prisoner,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: And stands colossus-wise, waving his beam,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Upon the pashed corses of the kings

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Epistrophus and Cedius: Polyxenes is slain,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Amphimachus and Thoas deadly hurt,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Patroclus ta'en or slain, and Palamedes

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Sore hurt and bruised: the dreadful Sagittary

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Appals our numbers: haste we, Diomed,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: To reinforcement, or we perish all.

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text_entry: Enter NESTOR

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Go, bear Patroclus' body to Achilles;

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: And bid the snail-paced Ajax arm for shame.

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: There is a thousand Hectors in the field:

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Now here he fights on Galathe his horse,

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: And there lacks work; anon he's there afoot,

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: And there they fly or die, like scaled sculls

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Before the belching whale; then is he yonder,

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: And there the strawy Greeks, ripe for his edge,

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Fall down before him, like the mower's swath:

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Here, there, and every where, he leaves and takes,

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Dexterity so obeying appetite

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: That what he will he does, and does so much

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: That proof is call'd impossibility.

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Enter ULYSSES

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: O, courage, courage, princes! great Achilles

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Is arming, weeping, cursing, vowing vengeance:

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Patroclus' wounds have roused his drowsy blood,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Together with his mangled Myrmidons,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: That noseless, handless, hack'd and chipp'd, come to him,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Crying on Hector. Ajax hath lost a friend

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: And foams at mouth, and he is arm'd and at it,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Roaring for Troilus, who hath done to-day

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Mad and fantastic execution,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Engaging and redeeming of himself

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: With such a careless force and forceless care

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: As if that luck, in very spite of cunning,

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Bade him win all.

speaker: ULYSSES
text_entry: Enter AJAX

speaker: AJAX
text_entry: Troilus! thou coward Troilus!

speaker: AJAX
text_entry: Exit

speaker: DIOMEDES
text_entry: Ay, there, there.

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: So, so, we draw together.

speaker: NESTOR
text_entry: Enter ACHILLES

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Where is this Hector?

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Come, come, thou boy-queller, show thy face;

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Know what it is to meet Achilles angry:

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Hector? where's Hector? I will none but Hector.

speaker: ACHILLES
text_entry: Exeunt
